== WhoAmI (Ju.) ==

I'm 31 years old, french living in New York.
I'm a system and network administrator.
My <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/people/ju|launchpad profile]]</nowiki>

=== Ubuntu ===

I have been using Ubuntu since Warty, and was really waiting for a debian based distribution like Ubuntu for a while.

I've met YannHamon and DavidLarlet in the <nowiki>[[http://ubuntustartguide.free.fr/hoary_party/|Hoary party]]</nowiki> and became the third Ubuntu-fr administrator some times later.

==== Events ====

I've been on three local events for Ubuntu in France :

** <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu-fr.org/photos/2005-09-12_fete_huma/page01.php|Fete de l'Humanite 2005]]</nowiki>
** <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu-fr.org/photos/2006-01-31_02-02-salon_Linux/stand_ubuntu/page01.php|Salon Linux 2006]]</nowiki>
** <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu-fr.org/photos/2006-02-11_12_Salon_Angevin_du_Multimedia/yann/page01.php|Salon angevin du multimedia]]</nowiki>

==== Ubuntu-fr ====

On the ubuntu-fr website :

** <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu-fr.org/presse|Press]]</nowiki> : I've launched and now contribute to this project : get authorization to publish and broadcast ''all'' the press articles about ubuntu
** <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu-fr.org/chat|Web form]]</nowiki> which launch a java applet connecting to #ubuntu-fr@irc.freenode.org
** Asked to Jane Silberg for ubuntu-fr to sign <nowiki>[[http://eucd.info/petitions/sign.html|petition]]</nowiki> about the french version of the Eucd (european version of DMCA) <nowiki>[[http://eucd.info/index.php?English-readers|for more info]]</nowiki>
** Prepare and sign the status for the french nonprofit organization '''Ubuntu-fr''', as a cofounder.
** <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu-fr.org/map|Map]]</nowiki> : Maintain the map of all the french speaking ubuntu users around the world
** <nowiki>[[http://forum.ubuntu-fr.org/|Ubuntu-fr Forum]]</nowiki> moderator
** <nowiki>[[http://doc.ubuntu-fr.org/|Ubuntu-fr Doc]]</nowiki> - On each modification a mail is sent to a dedicated mailing list (rw for anonymous at ubuntu-fr) I'm part of the team which check for vandalism or mistakes.

=== Ubuntu in the future ===

Dapper will be really a good challenge, the main goal will be to show that ubuntu is not only a very good desktop distribution, but the best choice for company too, on desktop and server.
